casebody.data:
JACKSON
v.
CENTURY MUTUAL INSURANCE COMPANY 337A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 2, 2017 Tony S. Botros, Attorney at Law, for Jackson, Thomas, et al. Susan K. Burkhart, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Century Mutual Insurance Company

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 30th of October 2017 by Plaintiffs:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 2nd of November 2017."

Plaintiff-Appellant shall have up to and including the 21st day of November 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
